suppressedMessages.message: React Hook useEffect has missing dependencies: 'generateMuseInitiatedMessage' and 'triggerProactiveMessage'. Either include them or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [generateMuseInitiatedMessage, triggerProactiveMessage]

suppressions.justification: Initial mount only, generateMuseInitiatedMessage and triggerProactiveMessage are stable
